intro: Siphanthera robusta, commonly known as the robust sponge tree, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. The plant is characterized by its large, showy yellow flowers and thick, waxy leaves that help it retain moisture in arid environments. Siphanthera robusta is also valued for its ability to fix nitrogen, improving soil fertility in its native habitats.
